Name: Dungeon
Description: You are in a small dungeon cell.

Items.Name: Pack of bubblegum
Items.Description: A pack of bubblegum. The brand name is "Hubbabubba". A classic from your childhood.

Items.Name: Rusty key
Items.Description: An old rusty key of simple design.

Items.Name: Test key
Items.Description: A test key of simple design.

Name: Oak Room
Description: You are in a large circular room, in the middle of the room there is a patch of dirt, and on it stands a large oak tree, far above the oak in the ceiling there is a small opening in the ceiling where some sun shines through

Items.Name: Stick
Items.Description: A stick from an oak tree, it's quite straight. It's a good stick.

Items.Name: Stick
Items.Description: A stick from an oak tree, it's quite straight. It's a good stick.

Items.Name: Stick
Items.Description: A stick from an oak tree, it's quite straight. It's a good stick.

RoomObjectOfInterest.Name: Oak
RoomObjectOfInterest.Description: A large oak tree, must be more than fifty years old. On the ground next to it you notice some sticks that have fallen from the tree

Name: Drainage Room
Description: You are in some sort of drainage room, the floor slopes towards the center of the room where there is a grated drain in the floor that collects water from the other rooms.

Name: Final room
Description: You walk though a long tunnel sloping upwards, you see daylight in the distance. You are free.
